cards.html:
The new update for Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (version 1.5.0) now brings the ability to race with the use of the Toy-Con Motorbike from Nintendo Labo Toy-Con 01 Variety kit.

Ever since the reveal of Nintendo Labo, fans have been speculating whether Nintendo were going to integrate it into their mainline series. And now, we no longer have to speculate.

Here’s the trailer…

 

Will you be trying this out? Let us know in the comment section below.

Don’t forget to like our Facebook Page in order to get updated with every article we post, along with more Nintendo content. And hey, why not check out a new trailer for Minecraft on Switch featuring both the Switch and the XBOX ONE?
